topics.body:
For those that don't get why One Piece is as good it's a very simple matter.

Think of that movie/book/videogame/webcomic/cartoon/comic book you like so much you gush like a child when you see it. What's it that draws it towards you, is it the characters? The story? The lore/world that was built around it? All of the above?

That's the reason people like what they like, they're drawn towards it because it appeals to something they connect to (or as many say too "Something made click").

Now think back to that piece of media you just loathe and want to see burn. Same reason why some don't like One Piece.

Sounds off and awful? Not at all, that symptom is commonly referred to as: Opinion.
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body: I say that One piece is good because it has very fun characters that are also Three dimensional and It has some very deep lore.

topics.body: Say what you want about One Piece. Eiichiro Oda's artwork cannot be denied in it's awesomeness. Oda is a master of perspective shots.
